prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a sleek, aerodynamic body.
Imagine a prehistoric dragon-like creature soaring through the skies.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of dinosaurs and modern birds.
Design a Pokemon with a powerful wingspan and aggressive demeanor.
Generate a creature that thrives in mountain habitats and has keen eyesight.
Make a mythical Pokemon that is both ancient and majestic in appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies speed and ferocity in battle.
